wikitext.*:
[[Image:Simonne d'Ardenne 21 September 1937.png|thumb]]
On [[21 September]] [[1937]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Simonne d'Ardenne]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 201</ref>

*'''Description:''' 1-page, handwritten letter, enclosed with a copy of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (published on this day) sent by Tolkien as a gift to Simonne d'Ardenne.
*'''Archive:''' The letter is kept at the [[Wikipedia:University of Liège|University of Liège]].<ref name=JRRVF>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.jrrvf.com/forum/noncgi/Forum3/HTML/000234.html|articlename=Tolkien & Simonne d'Ardenne (Oxford-Liège-Oxford) |dated=|website=[http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml JRRVF.com]|accessed=20 May 2012}}</ref>
